This vignette from the R package [JMDplots](https://github.com/jedick/JMDplots) contains plots from the paper by <a href="https://doi.org/10.3389/feart.2019.00180" title="CHNOSZ: Thermodynamic calculations and diagrams for geochemistry">Dick (2019)</a>.

```{r JMDplots, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(JMDplots)
```

## Mosaic Eh-pH diagram (Figure 4)
```{r chnszten4, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='300px'}
chnszten4()
knitr::include_graphics("chnszten4.pdf")
```

## Corundum solubility diagram (Figure 5)
```{r chnszten5, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='50%', out.height='300px'}
chnszten5()
knitr::include_graphics("chnszten5.pdf")
```

## <a href="http://www.dewcommunity.org/" title="Deep Earth Water Community">DEW</a> model (based on Fig. 3 of [Sverjensky et al., 2014](http://www.nature.com/doifinder/10.1038/ngeo2291)) (Figure 6)
```{r chnszten6, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='50%', out.height='350px'}
chnszten6()
knitr::include_graphics("chnszten6.pdf")
```

## Thermodynamic properties of reactions involving Al-bearing minerals (Figure 7)
```{r chnszten7, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='650px'}
chnszten7()
knitr::include_graphics("chnszten7.pdf")
```
